metadata.title: Solution and tools: Does the device need internet connectivity to perform the keyword recognition?

sections.content:
Question:
Does the device need internet connectivity to perform the keyword recognition?
Answer:
No, the keyword recognition functionality can be performed completely offline. No connection to the internet is needed.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
